parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

post.summary: Uploads a provider gallery item to the storage.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

requestBody.description: The URI to the gallery item JSON file.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: galleryItemName
parameters.description: Identity of the gallery item. Includes publisher name, item name, and may include version separated by period character.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: galleryItemName
parameters.description: Identity of the gallery item. Includes publisher name, item name, and may include version separated by period character.

deploymentFragmentFileUris.description: List of key-value pairs containing the deployment fragment file IDs defined in the package manifest.

deploymentTemplateFileUris.description: List of key-value containing the deployment template file IDs defined in the package manifest.

DefinitionTemplates.description: Holds UI definition file Uri and deployment template file URIs.

additionalProperties.description: List of additional properties provided for the item.

artifacts.description: List of artifacts for the gallery item.

categoryIds.description: List of category IDs the gallery item belongs to.

changedTime.description: Last update time of gallery item.

createdTime.description: The date and time that the gallery item was created.

description.description: The description of the gallery item.

filters.description: List of filters for the gallery item.

itemName.description: The display name for the gallery item, for the locale of the request.

itemType.description: Describes the type of the gallery item, either GalleryItem or ItemGroup.

longSummary.description: Long summary of the gallery item.

properties.description: List of properties provided for the gallery item.

publisher.description: The publisher of the gallery item.

resourceGroupName.description: Resource group name the gallery item belongs too.

screenshotUris.description: List of screenshot image URIs provided for the item.

summary.description: Short summary of the gallery item.

uiDefinitionUri.description: The URL of the view definition object that defines the UI information that is used when an instance of the gallery item resource definition is created.

version.description: The version identifier of the gallery item, in Major.Minor.Build format.

galleryItemUri.description: URI for your gallery package that has already been uploaded online.

LinkProperties.description: Represents a link item read from the gallery item package.

MarketingMaterial.description: Marketing material for a gallery item.

plans.description: List of plans available for the offer.

OfferDetails.description: Represents a offer details item read from the gallery item package.

OpenProperty.description: Open type used to define dynamic properties.

Plan.description: Represents a plan item read from the gallery item package.

legalTermsUri.description: URI to the legal terms of the product.

pricingDetailsUri.description: URI to the pricing details of the product.

privacyPolicyUri.description: URI to the privacy policy of the product.

publisherDisplayName.description: Publisher display name of the product.

Product.description: Represents a product item read from the gallery item package.

GalleryItemNameParameter.name: galleryItemName
GalleryItemNameParameter.description: Identity of the gallery item. Includes publisher name, item name, and may include version separated by period character.

GalleryItemUriPayloadParameter.description: The URI to the gallery item JSON file.

azure_auth.description: Authorization uses an Azure Active Directory OAuth2 flow.
